Priest Greymore:
+It will be not so difficult as it was possible to think. Their mantles. On them necessarily there should be traces of all paternosters and catalysts. If them to subject to due research in laboratory I can learn everything that it is necessary for me. But this work very much very laborious, therefore is required to me as much as possible of tattered clothes. Bring to me not less 100 Tattered Monk Clothes and I can thank you properly. But if you will bring it is more, my gratitude also will increase.

Agree
